title: FS: Uzit or Lose It National Sale
author: The Nasty Nati

posts.post_title: FS: Uzit or Lose It National Sale
posts.post_content:
Selling the following (shipped). Great cards for your collection or trade bait at The National. Price cut, final sale.

T206 Uzit Heinie Wagner Bat on Shoulder PSA 3 - [STRIKE]$5,000[/STRIKE] $4,550
T206 Uzit Admiral Schlei Batting PSA 1.5 - [STRIKE]$3,500[/STRIKE] $3,450
T206 Uzit Hooks Wiltse Portrait w/ Cap PSA 1 -[STRIKE] $3,000[/STRIKE] $2,950

Great cards! I love Uzits, cool bold design...some people think they are even rarer than Drums.

Good luck!

I'd have to agree. Uzits are pretty underrated compared to Drum.
